3: Although many parts of its structure are damaged, I can still feel the sense of sanctity when standing on the faded carpet like this...
During worships, people will gather here for important matters, and music will start playing...
I'm sorry... I was lost in my thoughts again. We're collecting building materials for the base, right?
Isn't it nice when time passes in peace and quiet, Commandant?
Let's save the chatting for after we finish our mission.
Commandant, please help check out what we can bring back as well.
There seems to be a projector split into two in the middle of the church...

4: Can we find out what it was projecting?

3: Bring it over first.
Videos of sermons, probably. This kind of device is pretty common before the outbreak, according to our database.
Huh... This wasn't shattered into two. It was designed to work only when the two parts come together.
Like this?
It'll probably work if you match them here.
My name is Edward.
My name is Julie.
...Is this a recording from the past?
If this is playing, it means someone has found our projection device.
What does the world look like now? Are there still Corrupted here?
Whoever this is that has found us, are you human? Or are you a Corrupted... or maybe something else entirely?
Whichever it is, there's something we want to ask you.
Will you please host a wedding for us?
